EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1311791732.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Ted,
As a courtesy I wanted to follow up from our conversation a few weeks ago. You had expressed some interest in using MBO as a way to plug into a small business infrastructure for some consulting you would be doing. Any update would be great. I look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Steve
Steven Arhancet Director of Associate Enrollment and Market Development O:703.793.6011 | M:540.560.8837 | F:703.793.6081 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive #300 Herndon, VA 20171 sarhancet@mbopartners.com www.mbopartners.com
